name: The Dark Mage ~ I am the Only Transcendant Mage who Regressed with Cheat Skills
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManga
content: &ltDungeons&gt suddenly appeared around the world, resulting in the awakening of humans. Those who possess skills are called [Colored], meanwhile those who are excellent are granted the title of &ltMage&gt.Kurosaki Rei, who has no skills, is discriminated and called &ltColorless&gt.Compared to him, his brother who is recognized as the &ltPurple King&gt. Regardless, Rei couldn&#039t give up his dream to become a &ltMage&gt.10 years after the first appearance of the the &ltDungeons&gt, a powerful
